purpleculture_pinyin:
jià
to sow grain; (farm) crop
сеять зерно; (ферма) урожай
rtega_mnemonic:
稼稼RSsow grain, sheaves of grain, earnings
  • household 家 sowing grain 禾 in order to harvest it
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 家 indicates the sound; 禾 (grain) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples: 稼穑 [ jià sè ]: (literary) sowing and reaping; farm work
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 禾 [ hé ] cereal, grain, rice; plant, stalk
    • 家 [ jiā ] house, home, residence; family
heisig_chinese_memo: Your earnings allow you to bring home your daily bread, made from wheat crops, naturally.
heisig_constituent: earnings, wheat, cereal, house, sow, pig
koohiiStory1: Your earnings allow you to bring home your daily bread (made of wheat, naturally).
koohiiStory2: Hmm, EARNINGS. Think of the popular saying "Bringing HOME the bacon". Here, EARNINGS is the picture "Bringing HOME the bread(WHEAT) and the bacon (PIG).
jp_example_words:
共稼ぎ(ともかせぎ): working together, (husband and wife) earning a living together
稼ぐ(かせぐ): earn income, to labor
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: The grains you have stored in your house reflect on your earnings. If you earn a lot of money, you have more grains.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine looking at the grains in the houses of people who make vastly different earnings. The poor artist has only a few sacks of grain. The rich samurai has an extra house just for holding his grain. That's how you know he has much higher earnings than the artist.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Another way to check someone's earnings is to see if they have a car (か). Would someone who doesn't make a lot of money have a car? No!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Picture your own earnings. Can you afford a lot of grains and a car?
Ru_Notes: Не путать: 嫁 (よめ、とつぐ、カ невеста, выходить замуж).
Ru_Radicals: 宀 (значок У), 禾 (ость колоса), 豕 (свинья)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: to get grain (禾) or a house (家) you need to work
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Your earnings allow you to bring home your daily bread, made from wheat crops, naturally.

稼字的基本解释

稼
jià
种植谷物，亦泛指农业劳动：稼穑。耕稼。
谷物：庄稼。

稼字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jià］
［《廣韻》古訝切，去禡，見。］
“斝2”的被通假字。
(1)耕作，种植。
(2)谷物；庄稼。

稼字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【禾字部】　稼； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页857第30
【唐韻】古訝切【集韻】【韻會】居訝切【正韻】居亞切，?音駕。種之曰稼，斂之曰穡。【書·洪範】土爰稼穡。【疏】種穀曰稼，若嫁女之有所生然。【說文】禾之秀實爲稼，莖節爲禾。【詩·豳風】十月納禾稼。　又【說文】一曰在野曰稼。　又【說文】一曰稼，家事也。　又叶古五切，音鼓。【韓愈·送李愿序】盤之中，維子之宮。盤之土，維子之稼。　又叶居賀切，音箇。【陸雲詩】有奄萋萋，甘雨未播。黍稷方華，中田多稼。庭槐振藻，園桃阿那。　【集韻】稼，或省作家。

稼字的源字形

稼字的起名意思

：意为耕种，种植。也表示谷物、庄稼。

Jia
jià
Growing cereals also refers to agricultural labor in general: crops. Plow crops.
Cereals: crops.
Jia
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jià］
["Guangyun" ancient surprised and cut, go to 禡, see. ]
"斝2" was passed falsely.
(1) Farming and planting.
(2) Cereals; crops.
Jia
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Set 2] [He Zi Department] 　 Jia; Kangxi strokes: 15; Page number: page 857 30
[Tang Yun] Ancient Xingqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Ju Xingqie [Zheng Yun] Ju Yaqie, sound driving. Planting is called Jia, and condensing is called Liao. [Book·Hong Fan] Soil and Jiarong. [Sparse] Planting grains is called crops, if you marry a daughter, you will be born. 【Said the text】The Xiu of He is actually a crop, and the stem node is He. 【Poetry·Binfeng】October to accept hea crops.　[Shuowen] One said that he was in the wild and said Jia.　[Said the text] One said Jia, and family affairs.　Yegu five cuts again, sound drum. [Han Yu·Send Li Yuanxu] In the plate, the Palace of Weizi. The soil of the disk, the crop of Weizi.　Ye Ju He cut again, Yin Xie. 【Lu Yun Poems】There is dying, but Gan Yu did not broadcast. The millet is Fanghua, and Zhongtian is more cropped. Garden Huai Zhenzao, Garden Tao Ana.　[Jiyun] Jia, or provincial writer.
Jia
Source glyph
Jia
Name meaning
: Means farming, planting. It also means grains and crops.
稼
会意字。从禾(庄稼),从家(家庭),在农业社会种植谷物往往是全家人一起从事的家中大事,家(jia )兼表声。本义
是种植谷物。
D种植(谷物):~積|耕~。②粮食作物:庄~。
~桑 ~積 庄~ 庄~汉
jià
線稼|稼
Цзя
Зная слово.
Conghe (урожай), Congjia (семья), посев злаков в сельскохозяйственном обществе часто является важным семейным событием, которым занимается вся семья вместе, и семья (цзя) также выражает свой голос.
Первоначальный смысл - выращивать зерно.
D посадки (зерновые): ~ продукт | плуг ~.
②Продовольственные культуры: Чжуан ~.
~ Сан ~ Цзи Чжуан ~ Чжуан ~ Хан
Линия кадрирования | урожай
jià
1) сеять хлеб
耕稼 пахать и сеять хлеб, заниматься хлебопашеством
2) хлеба; продукты земледелия
Radicals: 禾, 家  (grain, house)
Meaning Mnemonic
The grains you have stored in your house reflect on your earnings. If you earn a lot of money, you have more grains.
Imagine looking at the grains in the houses of people who make vastly different earnings. The poor artist has only a few sacks of grain. The rich samurai has an extra house just for holding his grain. That's how you know he has much higher earnings than the artist.
Reading Mnemonic
Another way to check someone's earnings is to see if they have a car (か). Would someone who doesn't make a lot of money have a car? No!
Picture your own earnings. Can you afford a lot of grains and a car?
